# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="c2461-102">將 emoji 新增到電子郵件訊息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c2461-103">您可以在您的郵件中插入 emoji。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c2461-104">現有的電子郵件回覆或選取**新的郵件**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c2461-105">選取 [**插入 emoji** ] 按鈕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="c2461-106">若要開啟 [運算式] 窗格的 [撰寫] 視窗的底部。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c2461-107">搜尋並選擇您想要插入的 GIF 的 emoji。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2461-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
